abstract: Want quick access to My Computer, My Documents or any folder on your Windows XP or Vista system?
snippet: Want quick access to My Computer, My Documents or any folder on your Windows XP or Vista system?
lead_paragraph: Want quick access to My Computer, My Documents or any folder on your Windows XP or Vista system? You can add it to your taskbar by right-clicking on the taskbar and selecting Toolbars from the menu. Choose New Toolbar from the menu and navigate to the folder you want to use and click Select Folder or O.K. When you click the taskbar icon for the folder you added, a pop-up menu lets you browse its contents and open files right there.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Quickly Access Folders on Windows XP or Vista
